label.subtitle: Development association
label.association.description: La Cruz is an association created by a group of computer science students from the Lyon 1 University Claude Bernard. Our objective is to keep an organisation like the one we had in our internships. Today, this association brings us a workplace which help us to brings projects to life outside of our own studies. All of the members are specialised in web technologies or in video-games development to improve our personal experiences and use our skills acquired in our studies.
label.legal.title: Legal
label.legal.title.text: In accordance with the provisions of Law No. 2004-575 of 21 June 2004 on trust in the digital economy, users of lacruz.org are informed of the identity of the various stakeholders in the context of its implementation and monitoring.

label.legal.cnil.text: The association La Cruz keeps no trace of your visit on our site.
